[A day earlier] (Tommy's POV)

"Wooow, I always imagined it looked like this!" The boy was amazed by how futuristic his father's lab appeared. Tommy's dad had only just left to the airport an hour earlier. The teen was ecstatic when he had accidentally found the hidden key to the forbidden room.

The pain didn't last long however, as it was quickly replaced with excitement. The room was even more amazing with the lights on. Huge machines and colorful bulbs were visible in every direction you could look. It was as if he had entered the lab of a mad scientist from a movie.

An hour went by as Tommy investigated all the machines in the room. He was unable to make heads or tails of most of them, though some seemed pretty straight forward. Just as he was thinking about calling it a day, one machine in the corner of the room had caught his eye. It was a circular platform about the diameter of a portable trampoline. Next to it was podium with what looked like a control panel installed on top.

"...what IS this...?" The boy circled the set up curiously, nervously poking at all the random parts. For some reason the device looked a lot more advanced the rest of the equipment in the room. Though he had no idea what it was for, it was pretty obvious that something was supposed to be placed on the platform. Tommy looked around around the room until his eyes fixed nearby lab chair. Carefully pulling the seat onto the small platform, he positioned it directly in the center of the circle. After walking back to the controls, he nervously started pressing random buttons.

"Nothing...." He sighed with disappointment. Just as he was about to turn around to leave, the platform began to emit a low humming noise.

"huh..." Tommy watched as something amazing began to happen.

The chair was changing....no, it was shrinking! The 14 year old stared on in awe as the chair's mass collapsed on itself. His head tilting lower and lower as he continued to watch it's minimization. By the time the machine had finally stopped humming, the chair was roughly about an inch and a half tall.

With his jaw hanging open, Tommy slowly walked towards the platform. Getting down on his knees, focusing in on the tiny chair.

"Amazing......." He was tempted to reach out and touch it, but he was also a little afraid that the machine still hadn't completely died down. Nervously, he reached his index finger past the parameter of the circle. Squinting his eyes with fear, he slowly re-opened them to find that there was nothing wrong.

"Phew..." Tommy exhaled with relief.

He poked the chair lightly once, then twice. Feeling confident that it was safe, he surrounded the entire chair with his open palm. Carefully grabbing the tiny furniture, the boy effortlessly lifted it up to his face.

"Neat...." He muttered in total wonder.

His mind was now going at a hundred miles per second. He was thinking of all the fun he could have with a machine like this. Ideas of shrinking his skateboard, or even some of his old junk came to mind.

Tommy's eyes widened brightly when he realized he could invite his best friend Eric over to shrink a bunch of their stuff together.

Grinning with excitement at the idea of sharing this discovery with his friend, Eric was suddenly hit with another idea.

"Wait...can this thing shrink people too?" he thought out loud to himself.

His facial expression went blank as he considered this new thought. He started to imagine what it would be like to shrink an actual person. Without completely realizing it, Tommy had begun immersing himself in a fantasy about watching his best friend shrink to the size of a toy.

Tommy let out a nervous chuckle. What was he thinking? He couldn't do that. He didn't even know if this machine could grow things back to their normal size........Still, the scene continued to play in his mind over and over again, feeding his desire to actually see it happen.

Looking back down at the chair in his palm, he began to imagine as if a tiny person were sitting in it. Amused by the thought, he lowered the chair back down onto the ground between his socked feet. The teen couldn't help but grin as he tried to visualize how big he would look from the perspective of someone that small.

"Hmmm, I wonder where Eric went? I thought he was sitting over here a moment ago.." he playfully spoke out loud.

Continuing to entertain the mini-fantasy, the 14 year old began to lift his right foot over the chair.

"Woah... I could crush it at that size....." The boy whispered to himself with growing excitement.

Deciding that crushing the chair would be a waste, he lowered his foot to the side of the miniture seat.

Tommy pulled out a key-chain from his pocket with a miniature two-inch-tall soccer-player attached to it.

"M-maybe he wouldn't mind... I mean..maybe he might think it would be cool..." The boy lightly rubbed the side of the figurine with his thumb.

Deep down Tommy knew that Eric would never agree to do something so dangerous. There was no way he would be able to get him to go through with it.

"....hmmm" Tommy started to formulate as he turned off the machine and walked out of the room. The teen pulled out his cellphone and began to make a call.

"Hey dude...you there? I got something AWESOME to show you~"

He had no idea that his flatulence had rocketed his microscopic friend into his intestines as he continued to rub his bloated gut.

In his belly, Eric had been freed from the gas bubble. He was now floating through Tommy's small intestine. "Gross... looks like I'm taking the low road out of here. Unless... I could get into his bloodstream!"

Swimming furiously for the nearest wall of Tommy's gut, Eric...
12122122.title: Deeper

choices: He was brought to Tommy's kidney
He was brought to Tommy's lungs
121221221.content:
Eric swam to the nearest wall of Tommy’s small intestine, where countless villi were swinging to Tommy’s intestinal peristalsis waves like a forest of seaweeds dangling under the wave, catching tiny pieces of Tommy’s last meal in the dark, murky and disgusting mixture of cola, bile and stomach juice. Grabbing one of the villi, Eric tried to squeeze himself leg first into its “head”. “Come on! Let me in you stupid little intestine thing!” he mumbled, struggling to get his feet in. Suddenly he felt a strong suction from the villus as it quickly swallowed him through a small and thin membrane on its top. The sight of Tommy’s intestine soon faded away as Eric was squeezed through a completely dark, squishy and tight tunnel, even for someone (or something) that is as tiny as him.
The tube started to become more and more spacious. A short moment later, Eric was blasted into his next destination, a thick and reddish liquid, which he immediately knew was Tommy’s bloodstream. He awed at the scenery. The blood vessel was dimply lit in a very dark, pinkish hue. Eric could still somehow breathing in this environment, and looking around, he could see millions and millions of tiny red blood cells and platelets, which was about the size of his little finger’s nail or smaller, inside the rushing liquid, carrying nutrition to Tommy’s heart, where it would be delivered throughout his body. Eric screamed in happiness. He is maybe the first human to have ever survived being swallowed into someone stomach, sucked into the small intestine and even entered someone’s bloodstream, especially when that someone is his best friend. Being carried by his friend’s bloodstream, he could hear every kind of sound that Tommy’s organs made. He could hear the gurgling sound of Tommy stomach digesting his cheese and ham sandwich, the hollow sound of Tommy’s lungs breathing in and out, and the loud, booming sound that was Tommy’s beating heart. The heart beat is quite slow and relaxing, indicated that Tommy is either resting or sleeping.
Outside, Tommy was watching his favorite show on TV. The fizzling feeling from the cola inside his belly had began to fade away as it made its way into his guts. But he could still hear the gurgling sound his full tummy made while it was digesting his lunch. He was still a little bit angry about Eric running away, and think about all the amazing things he could’ve done with his tiny friend. He soon dozed off as a result of his full stomach, still not aware of the fact that Eric was still (technically speaking) by his side all along.
As Eric was getting closer and closer to his friend’s heart, a little thought came up in his mind: He had only planned to go inside his friend’s bloodstream, how would he navigate through the extremely complicated maze of Tommy’s circulatory system? He couldn’t just make Tommy’s bloodstream to carry him to his lungs or his nose, or knew exactly which blood vessel in thousands of other blood vessels that would lead him out. Who knew where Tommy’s bloodstream would bring him to? As soon as he began to worry about that, the booming sound of Tommy’s heart was getting louder and louder, to the point that Eric had to hold his tiny ears. And all of sudden, Eric’s microscopic body was shot with an incredible speed into the enormous chamber that was Tommy’s heart. The bloodstream slowed down a bit in his heart as the valve closed, allowing Eric to regain his sight. His worries were replaced by excitement as he let out another scream of happiness. This was unbelievable! He was actually inside his best friend’s heart, floating along with other tiny blood cells. . This was the most fascinating experience that Eric’s ever had. It’s like that old Fantastic Voyage movie that he watched and like very much when he was a kid. He had always wanted to have a voyage like that in the movie, and now it was like his childhood dream came true.
Eric had a quick glance at the heart’s inside, its shape, its white, curtain-liked valves, its veiny walls, and before he could really enjoy the scenery of his friend's heart or come up with another plan to solve his navigation problem, the heart beat again and Eric’s miniscule body was shot into another chamber, then into the artery and to the endless network of blood vessels, along with his bloodstream, carrying oxygen and nutrition to others part of the body.
Where will the heart bring Eric to?
121221221.title: Bloodstream

choices: He was coughed out along with the spit
1212212212.content:
Eric waked up as the loud sound of Tommy’s heartbeats were getting louder and louder again. He had dozed off on his journey throughout his friend’s bloodstream and slept for how long he couldn’t remember. “That was longer than I have expected!” He though. The scenery around him had somehow changed. The wall was paler, and the stream of red blood cells had changed into a darker shade of red. Eric was inside a vein–where blood is brought back to Tommy’s lungs after its long journey to take more oxygen and deliver carbon dioxide back to the lungs to exhale, then continued its journey again. Suddenly, a light bulb came on in Eric’s head: he can escape through Tommy’s lungs through those alveoli things and get outside through his throat and to his mouth or his nose. Determined to escape, Eric smiled confidently as the bloodstream brought him closer and closer to his destination. The closer he got to the lungs, the louder Tommy’s heartbeats and breathing sounded. The wall of the vein Eric was in seemed like it had become clearer. Through that, Eric could faintly see the slightly blurred shape of his destination: a bunch of air sacs that slowly expanded and contracted as Tommy breathed. As he arrived at the alveoli along with the rushing bloodstream, Eric could see the pinkish inner wall that would be the first obstacle he had to get through, literally.
“Now, this is my chance! TO FREEDOM!” Eric screamed as he charged at the wall and squeezed himself through the pinkish membrane. It was thicker than that of the villi in Tommy’s intestine but squishier and slicker. After struggling for a moment, he finally made it through. The scenery changed, and ahead his eyes was a small tunnel. It had the same color of the alveoli, but more reddish. He was inside one of the tiny bronchiole inside Tommy’s lung.
“Now, to his throat and I’ll be free.” Eric said as he began his journey. The ground was covered with disgusting sticky mucus. That along with the rushing air current of his friend’s breath made Eric felt like he was walking through a muddy swamp in a stormy day with occasionally raindrops of Tommy’s saliva mistakenly pulled into his lung. He’s been thinking of using Tommy’s breath as a quicker way to get out, but abandoned since he couldn’t navigate in the fast air current, and a little dangerous. Walking and climbing out took more time, but may be it would be safer.
After nearly half an hour walking through countless smaller tubes, Eric’s finally reached the main bronchus and arrived at his friend’s wind pipe. The tunnel had gotten much wider, as if a car could run inside it. The walls had weird white ribs protruding, forming many white rings. Eric thought it looked like the inside of a stretched accordion. This would be the hard part of his escape, since the tube was nearly vertical, and the wind was stronger. Not wanting to waste any more time, Eric began to climb, using the white cartilage rings as foot holders like climbing a ladder, but much, much stickier. Suddenly, Eric felt a weird feeling on his legs. He looked down to see that the mucus had begun to cover his foot, then his legs. His hands was also slowly covered by it. He was stuck inside Tommy’s spit (or his phlegm). His body must have registered Eric as a foreign invader, and trapped him in this mucus.
“Ewww, this is so gross! Damn you Tommy!” Eric struggled to get himself out of the spit. But every time he moved, the mucus seemed to be stickier. “This is not good!” Eric said to himself. He’s already felt small vibrates along the wall. If he don’t get out soon, he will be coughed out and could end up in the trash can, the sink, or worse: a trip to oblivion in the toilet.
1212212212.title: He was brought to Tommy's lungs

choices: On the soft skin of Tommy's hand
On the carpeted floor of Tommy's room
12122122122.content:
The wind pipe’s wall were vibrating violently, as Tommy’s body tried to get rid of the foreign invader inside his trachea. More and more sticky mucus were slowly cover Eric, left only his head uncovered.
Outside, Tommy was still sleeping. He was having a dream where he was playing with his tiny Eric. But suddenly, he felt an itch inside his chest and woke up. He must have got something in his lung. Maybe some dust or something. He began to cough as a natural reflex, tried to get the thing out of his chest. But it seemed like the things was too deep inside. Tommy coughed more violently. He could feel the thing stuck inside his wind pipe, and is slowly moving its way upward to his mouth.
“This is not good! Very not good!” Eric shouted as he felt the mucus covered his body. He was unable to escaped, and he had already felt the wind rising. Then a terrible “ARRRRRRRRRRFFFFFFF” noise shook the wall he was on, nearly deafen him. “Tommy is coughing. I must get out of this thing before it’s too late!” Eric said as he kept wiggling his minuscule body to escaped the phlegm, not knowing that the more he tried to escaped, the more triggered the trachea was. Tommy continued to cough, each cough is more violently the previous one. Eric could see that every time his friends cough, the mucus he was trapped in moved upward a little bit. Finally, after a series of violent coughing, a gigantic gust of air blasted out, carrying the phlegm along with Eric out. Eric could see that he was flying out of the pipe, passed the gigantic vocal cord and out of the enormous cave that was Tommy’s mouth. The bright light blinded him as he land on a soft surface. Still having vertigo from the ride, he wiggled himself out of the mucus blob, now somehow looser than it was. He looked around, try to find out where he had landed. Where did he land?
12122122122.title: He was coughed out along with the spit

13.content:
Tommy quickly slammed the door behind Eric and pulled the teen up the stairs to his room.

"So *pant* what *pant* exactly is it that you want to *pant* show me?" Eric ask exasperatedly.

"Yoooou'lll seeeee" Tommy mused playfully.

Eventually the two teens made it into Tommy's bedroom. It was about average size. light blue walls, thick deep blue carpeting. The floor was scattered with various knickknacks and toys. playing cards, action figures, a remote controlled car and various discarded pieces of clothing all over the place. It was a little messy, but it was only natural for a boy his age. Various shelves covered the walls which were holding up papercraft models and rock collections. He also had a TV and a gaming system as well.

"Alright, lets see it" Eric was starting to become suspicious of whatever Tommy had to show him was really all that special at all. "Don't tell me this is just another one of those fake rare trading cards"

"Hey! They're not stupid!" Tommy scowled. The boy walked over to his closet and pulled out a red shoebox. "THIS is what I want you to see"

"A shoe box?... common man... really?" Eric rolled his eyes sarcastically.

Tommy smirked as he pulled the lid open. Eric's face suddenly went from unenthusiastic to curious.

"What IS that..."

Inside the box was what looked like toy lazer gun with a phone sized touch screen. Tommy pulled out the gun, gripping it in his hand.
"You suuuuuuure you wanna see?" there was a hint of spite in his words.

"Alright alright, you win, it's pretty cool looking...but really..."

Without any further dialog Tommy faced the left side of his room where his brown desk and chair were positioned. He aimed the gun at chair and started pressing a few commands on the touch screen.

Just as Eric was about to ask again, Tommy pulled the trigger, shooting out a bright beam of blue light that quickly enveloped the entire chair. When the light had subsided Eric's jaw dropped.

The Chair and desk were now yellow!

"Woah! How did you do that?"

"This gun can change the properties of whatever I shoot it with; any property I want"

"DUDE! WHERE DID YOU GET THAT THING?"

"I found it in my dad's lab after he left the state"

Eric stared at the gun and imagined all the fun opportunities the two of them could have with it.

"so, what else can it d-" Tommy cut you off

"No, what CAN'T it do..." he replied smugly.

----
For the next hour the two boys experimented with the gun on various objects in Tommy's room. They turned a few of his old playing cards into bars of chocolate, morphed a sock into a fan, Transformed his old baseball mitt into a toaster. There wasn't ANYTHING the device couldn't do.

The display screen on the device had a search option that allowed you to select virtually any object you desired. There was even a [revert] button that changed all the objects back to their original forms.

Suddenly, an idea formed in Eric's mind.

"Hey, do you think we could even ....transform ourselves?"

Tommy looked a bit confused at first. He must have not even considered trying that.

"Well... I guess. I mean... maybe we should try it on something living before I do that..."

The both of the teens seemed to have the same idea as they turned their attention to Tommy's hamster cage. Inside was a male hamster Tommy had named Gear.

"Dude, you don't have to if you don't want to..." Even though Eric had said this, he still were very curious.

"No, I want to see what happens too..." Tommy replied slowly. The teen pulled the hamster out of the cage and placed it on the carpet below.

"Good luck Gear" Tommy spoke as he aimed. He had set the result option as [Lamp]

With a blinding flash the hamster was gone. In it's place, all that remained was a silver lamp.

"woooah, it does work on living things..." Eric muttered. "Alright, turn him back now"

Tommy clicked the [revert] switch and shot the lamp.

As if he nothing had happened at all, Gear was back, scurrying across the floor like had been moments ago.

"Well... that settles it" Eric spoke. "So....you wanna try?" he continued.

Tommy reached down and grabbed Gear, placing him onto his bed "....Lets do it..." he replied.

The both of them were admittedly excited but also kind of nervous. Was this really a good idea? Would this even work properly with humans?

"Here" Tommy said as he gave Eric the gun. "You do me first"

".... Are you sure?" Deep down Eric were kind of relieved that his friend had volunteered to go first.

"Yeah..JUST DON'T MAKE ME INTO SOMETHING STUPID OR GIRLY" He glared

"haaah, fine fine" Eric looked down into the display and began to think of things he could turn Tommy into....
13.title: The surprise

131.content:
Eric starts looking through the object directory on the device with a huge smile.

"lets see.... a bowl of cereal?"

"Uh no!" says Tommy with disapproval

"Uhh... a pancake?"

"NO."

"A slice of pizz-"

"WHY DO YOU WANT TO TURN ME INTO FOOD?!?" Tommy shouted loudly with a non-serious tone.

"Heh, sorry, I guess I've got food on the mind. I didn't really finish all my breakfast this morning"

"So, you were planning on snacking on me? Wow, some friend you are"

"No! That's not what I was..just ...ughhh never-mind.......Why can't you just trust me?"

"Uh no. You're not exactly the most reliable person I know." Tommy sighed sarcastically

"Hey! What's that supposed to mean?"

"Are you serious? I can't even count the amount of times I've asked you to do something for me, only to learn you totally forgot about it."

"Oh yeah? Name one time"

"The time I asked you to hand in my math homework"

"..oh..but.. That was your fault for not reminding me!"

"SERIOUSLY?! I called you two times about it the night before!" Tommy was starting to get genuinely annoyed.

"Yeah, I remember. I missed a chance to beat my high score on Katamari Damacy because of one of those calls! You and your stupid obsessiveness."

"WOW. Your stupid video game is more important than my grade?! What kind of friend are you?"

Eric was really ticked now.

"What about you?! You're always such an up-tight jerk. That's the reason I'm practically your only friend. No one even likes you. It's probably the reason your dad is always away from home!

The moment the words left Eric's mouth, he immediately regretted them. Tommy looked like he was already fighting back the urge to cry.

"A JERK HUH?! I COULD SAY THE SAME! MAYBE YOU SHOULD JUST GO! I'M STARTING TO THINK THAT LIFE WITHOUT YOU AROUND WOULD BE MUCH EASIER!"

With that Tommy stormed out of his room with watery eyes as he ran into the hallway bathroom.

"Ugh, why am I so stupid?" Eric thought to himself.

He knew that deep down Tommy didn't mean anything he had said. Neither of them had many other friends to speak of. The two had been best friends forever.

The teen sighed as he walked over to Tommy's bed. Placing the transformation gun down, the Eric noticed that Gear was still scurrying around on the top of the wide mattress.

"What do YOU think I should do?" Spoke Eric, playfully stroking the small mammal.

"Meh, I'm sure time will heal this. We've been through worse arguments than this" Eric continued speaking to himself in the empty room.

"I should talk with him" The teen whispered as he stood up and began walking towards the entrance of the room.

Unknowingly to Eric, the curious hamster had begun investigating the transformation device as he walked away.

There was a sudden *Beep* noise as the hamster's hind-leg nudged against the trigger.

Eric turned around just in time to see a bright flash.

....

..

"W-..what happened?!" Eric heart began to race rapidly as he now viewed the room from an entirely different perspective. The room was now enormous. The desk, the bed, and everything else completely towered over him.

"W-..wait a minute Why... why am I so small?!"

That was when Eric noticed Gear standing a short distance away from him. He could tell that they were both about roughly the same size.

("how did he get down here so fast?")

The teen wasn't sure if he should approach the hamster since it didn't seem to be moving. Deciding he had to do something, Eric began to walk towards the furry creature. Just as he did however, the hamster started to walk towards him as well.

The sudden movement made Eric stop in his tracks, but to his surprise, Gear did the exact same thing.

...."w-what...."

Eric's heart suddenly stopped. He had only just realized that he was facing the mirror of Tommy's closet. The hamster in the reflection wasn't Gear....

..... it was him.

"W...W...W.." He couldn't make a word.

Frantically, the newly transformed hamster turned around and looked desperately towards the bed where the transformation device had been.

It was still sitting where it had been, but what really caught Eric's attention was the ACTUAL Gear. He had somehow climbed up onto the window-sill from Tommy's bed and was beginning to crawl onto the roof outside.

Eric would have felt guilty, but he was more concerned with his own situation.

("I have to get to that device...") He spoke internally.

Without giving it another second to consider, he began to run across the massive room.

Running on all fours wasn't easy at first, but the more he ran, the more instinctual the act became.

Just as he was half way there...

*THUMP*

*THUMP*

*THUMP*

("...w-what is that?")

Eric stopped in his tracks and turned to see where the source of the loud vibrations were coming from.

He held is breath as the massive form of his younger friend came walking through the door-frame.

("augh crap...")

"ugh, it was all this stupid thing's fault. I should have never even bothered with it. Nothing is worth losing a friendship over. Useless garbage!"

Feeling the urge to vent his frustration, the teen dropped the gun on the floor and raised his foot over it.

-----

*STOMP* *STOMP* The display screen cracked almost instantly.

*CRUNCH* *CRUNCH* The hard outer plastic began to crack leaving the inner circuits completely vulnerable.

With one last stomp, Tommy brought his heel down with a loud *CRUUUUNNCHH* *FIZZLE~*

Feeling satisfied and breathing heavily, Tommy wiped his forehead and plopped down onto his bed.

Tommy's sneakers slammed down on the carpet with a loud "THUMP!"

His transformed friend recognized the sound now. Each step sounded like tons of weight slamming down and compressing the shag carpet.

"Crap! He's huge now!" Eric squeaked, unable to make any other sound.

He also made his first discovery about hamsters — the little rodents are near-sighted and colorblind. He noticed those facts as his new hamster vision blurred Tommy's approaching form, which Eric's eyes rendered only in shade of gray.


"Gear, what are you doing out of your cage?" Tommy's voice revealed his exasperation and bad mood.

"No! I'm not Gear!" Eric squeaked. "Gear went out the window!"

Eric gulped and tried to run when he saw his giant friend stooping to pick him up. The giant hand came into focus as it moved closer to him.

Tommy had trained Gear to enjoy being handled, but Eric had never gone through the training and squirmed and squeaked as his friend's fingers cradled him.

"What's wrong, Gear?" Tommy asked, noticing the hamster's agitated state. He also noticed that Eric had left, but he felt only satisfaction.

The hamster squeaked.

"Who needs Eric?" Tommy said and tried to sooth his little pet. "You're all I need, Gear."

"No!" Eric squeaked in such desperation his vocalization entered the ultrasonic range.

"I'm sorry we experimented on you, Gear," Tommy said. "It was all Eric's idea."

When the hamster still appeared agitated, Eric walked to the deluxe hamster cage that served as Gear's home. He figured the hamster needed some time to calm down.

"No! Not in there!" Eric pleaded. "Tommy, please! It's me!"

Tommy ignored the protesting hamster as he returned it to its cage. Ignoring the little hamster, which pressed its paws up against a panel of transparent plastic that served as one of the cage's barriers, Tommy decided to play some video games. He did glance at his phone on the off-chance that Eric might have texted with an apology.

Seeing no text, he grew angry again and vowed not to cave. "He will have to text or call me first," Tommy declared to himself.

"Which card?" Eric asked as he scrolled through all the different types.

"Green Nova!" he chirped

Eric wasn't surprised. It was no secret that Green nova was Tommy's favorite card in the game.

The teen suddenly felt stupid as he remembered that trading cards obviously couldn't talk. In fact, he was starting to wonder if Tommy was even conscious while he was in this form.

The teen walked over to Tommy's desk where a deck of Tommy's other cards sat. He picked one up and compared it to his newly transformed friend.

Suddenly the sound of Tommy's doorbell rang.

Eric walked back into the room.

Finding that the deck had spilled onto the carpet, Eric's whole body tensed.

"SHIT" he ran over and began to pick up all the cards.

He searched nervously for his best friend as he shuffled through them.

Suddenly, the Green Nova card caught his eye.

"Ah ha! Found you!" Eric's fears were alleviated as he pulled it from the pile.

Quickly shuffling the rest of the cards back into the form of a deck, he slid the newly organized cards into Tommy's nearby cardholder, buttoning it closed tighty.

Alright, that's enough excitement for today Eric spoke as he placed the green nova card on the ground.

Picking up the gun, he aimed it at his friend.

He pressed the [revert] button *FLASH*

...
...

Nothing..
...

... Wait what?

[revert] FLASH [revert] FLASH

Eric did this another four times until he realized something was wrong.

"I KNEW THIS WOULD HAPPEN!"

"Good thing I scanned him in...." the teen said as he looked up the [Tommy] setting.

Aiming the gun at the card once more, he pulled the trigger. With a flashing light, Tommy had returned. His body was laid across the carpet as if he were in a deep sleep.

"Phew...I was a little worried there for a moment" Eric sighed.

He walked over to his friend and shook him

"Hey Hey! Tommy wake up!"

Feeling nervous, he placed his head over the teen's chest to listen for a heart beat.

*thump* *thump*

"oh good.... he's just sleeping..."

Eric immediately assumed that the gun must have put him into sleep-mode while he was turned into a card.

"Alright... I guess I'll let you rest.."

He carefully pulled his friend off the floor and into his bed.

"I guess I'll see you tomorrow dude..." He whispered softly.

Before leaving the room, his eyes stopped on Tommy's card holder.

("mm... Maybe he wouldn't mind if I borrowed it for a little while..")

Not giving it another thought, Eric picked up the holder and walked out of Tommy's house.
132.title: Into a rare trading card

1321.content:
The flash blinded Tommy for a moment.

When he opened his eyes, he could only see the ceiling. The teen attempted to move but found that his body was paralyzed.

"D-..did it work? Am I a card?" Judging from his new perspective he quickly assumed he was right.

"I'M A CARD?!?! COOOL!" He yelled internally.

"But..how am I able to see??" Tommy continued to wonder as a shadow fell over him.

He stared in awe as his best friend now stood over him like a titan.

"Eric! dude! You're huge!!"

Tommy couldn't help but feel anxiety as the teen's massive hand came down to grab him.

"Wooooow, how does it feel?" Eric spoke.

"AMAZING!!" Tommy shouted internally. He knew Eric couldn't hear him, but he was simply too excited to care.

Tommy felt himself be carried to his desk.

Eric placed him side-by-side with another trading card.

"Wooow, I really am a card!" The teen still couldn't get over his transformation.

That was when the doorbell rang.

Eric placed him on the top of his deck and left the room.

"...so this is how it feels to be a part of a deck....neat..."

Just as he was having the most fun, a sudden gust of wind blew into the deck he was placed on.

"huh..HUH!!?!" The wind was so strong that it knocked the deck completely over.

Tommy screamed as he fell through the air and down on to the carpet. Card after card landed on him until he was in total darkness.

"ERIC!! ERIC?!?!" Tommy was frantic. He had never been a fan of closed-in spaces.

That was when he heard the thumps of his friend's feet entering the room.

"PLEASE GET ME OUT OF HERE!!" He shouted.

He eventually felt the sound of cards shifting above him until light broke through.

He smiled internally as Eric looked down into the pile.

"I'M RIGHT HERE!!"

Eric's face relaxed suddenly. "Ah! There you are" He spoke.

"Ahhh good finally! Now change me back. this is starting to freak me out a little."

Tommy watched as Eric's hand entered the pile and pulled out a card. His heart stopped as he realized it was a regular Green Nova card.

"hey..HEY HEY! WAIT THAT'S NOT ME!!"

Eric seemed convinced that he had found his friend. Looking back down at the other cards, he began to shuffle them back into a deck.

"NOOOOO!!! ERIC STOOOOOOO-...."

Tommy screamed in horror as his world was plunged into darkness again after being shuffled somewhere into the middle of the deck.

He could only continue to internally scream until he felt the deck being slid into something. All it took was a sudden *SNAP* for him to realize he had been placed into his own card-holder.

It was then that Tommy remembered that Eric would have to eventually realize that the card he was holding wasn't really him after it inevitably failed to [revert] back into his best friend.

The transformed teen sighed as relief flooded his panicked mind.

And so he began to wait....and wait.....and wait....

Minutes went by and nothing happened. He couldn't hear anything from in-between the many cards above and below him.

Just as he was starting to get nervous, the entire card-holder shifted.

"oh thank god...."

Tommy eagerly waited for the cards to be pulled out at any moment.
...
...
..
"Eric?.... Eric?" He could feel the cardholder swinging back and forth. Then there was a loud bang of a door.

"H-hey... you're not leaving me house ARE YOU?!!"

.."ERIIIIIIIIIIIC!!!"
1321.title: Tommy's POV

choices: Andrew takes the cards to school with him
13211.content:
Entering his house, Eric spotted his 9 year old brother Andrew sprawled out on the living room couch, still wearing his soccer clothes.

"My show comes on soon, so you're going to have to get up in a few minutes" Eric spoke to the boy.

"Heeey! I wanted to watch cartoons!" the little kid whined.

"Don't make me pull you off you little brat" Eric threatened.

Andrew pouted angerly until he noticed the card holder in his older brother's hand.

"Did you get new cards?!" The boy's face beamed with excitement

"Don't even think about it. They're Tommy's. I'm just borrowing them for a few days.."

Andrew's brows curled in disappointment. "Whatever... that game is stupid anyways..."

Eric walked up the stairs to his bedroom. Placing the cardholder on his bed, he began to change into his pajamas.

After leaving the room and walking back downstairs, the sound of Andrew screaming as he was pulled off the couch echoed through the entire house.

The young boy scowled as he stomped up the stairs and down the hall. He immediately stopped however as he was passing his older brother's open room. There on his older brother's bed was Tommy's cardholder.

The boy grinned evilly as he ran over to it.

Popping it's button open he pulled the deck out and began to inspect them.

"Coool!!! He has Angel's bow! And Earth Jar!!" Andrew's eyes greedily skimmed through the pile.

"lets see... I'll take this one.. and this one" The boy picked out a few cards and quickly stuffed them into his pocket.

He was just about to stop when he noticed the Green Nova card.

"Cool! this one's rare!" He pulled it out from the deck and jammed it into his pocket with the rest.

Buttoning the cardholder shut, he swiftly ran to his own bedroom.

After closing the door behind him, he ran over to his own card holder. Pulling the cards out of his pocket, he gleamed down on them possessively.

"Welcome to your new home!" He smiled as he slid the new cards into the red pouch. *snap*
13211.title: Eric arrives back home

132111.content:
[The next day][Andrew's school]

Andrew was sitting in his desk at school. His feet swinging back and forth under his chair. The boy's attention were completely focused on the clock.

"common.....common..."....

*RING RING RING*

The sound of the bell meant one thing to the boy.

"RECESS!!" One other boy in the back of class shouted.

The teacher didn't even bother trying to slow them down as they stormed out of the classroom.

Tommy ran through the hallway to his locker. After finishing the combination, he pulled the door open and smiled as his eyes fixed on his card-pouch.

Grabbing it, the boy locked the locker and ran out onto the playground.

There were numerous kids running around, but Andrew only focused his attention on a group of four boys playing cards in the corner of of the enclosed area.

"Hey guys!"

"Hey Andrew" they all seemed to know each other.

"Ready to play?" Andrew grinned as he pulled open his Card holder

----
Tommy POV

The previous night Tommy was surprised to see Eric's younger brother open up his pouch and examine his cards.

"ANDREW!!! PLEASE!! IT'S ME!! TOMMY! YOUR BROTHER'S FRIEND!!"

All of his pleas went completely unnoticed to the young boy. Not very surprising though, to him it was just a simple deck of cards.

"I'll take this one.. and this one.."

H-..HEY! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?! THOSE ARE MY CARDS!!" Tommy seemed to momentarily forget the situation he was in as he watched the kid begin stealing his cards.

Tommy held his breath when Andrew's eyes fell on him. ("does he realize it's me?")

"COOL! THIS ONE IS RARE"

Tommy fell into despair as the young boy grabbed roughly shoved him into his pocket.

"Owww!........Wait.... D-did I just feel pain?" Tommy asked himself worryingly.

Andrew eventually pulled him out again and smiled widely at his new possession.

"Welcome to your new home!!"

"A-andrew! I'm not a card!! I'm a human!! I'm A HU-"

Andrew slid his new cards into his pouch. *SNAP*

--

Tommy was forced to sit alone in the darkness through the entire night and following morning. Unfortunately, being a card meant he couldn't sleep.

To the teen's surprise, he felt the cards being pulled from the pouch.

"ANDREW/!? SOMEONE?! PLEASE! GET ME OUT OF HERE" If Tommy could cry he would have. Being trapped in a dark tight space for such a long period of time must have been hell for him. He couldn't move, he didn't have anyone to talk to. It was practically solitary confinement. The fate of many cards.

He felt the deck being placed down. Tommy could hear the sound of screaming children in the background.

"...where am I?"

As time went on, he began to notice the cards on top of him getting lighter and lighter.

"Eric?!" He cried when the card above him was pulled away.

Above him was the same kid who locked him away the night before.

"ANDREW..!" He knew that his voice couldn't be heard, but if there was just a mere chance that it could....

The boy looked down at him. That familiar boyish smile spread across his young mischievous face. It was almost as if he was smiling just to spite the teen.

Andrew reached down and forcibly grabbed the card.

The transformed teen felt a slight pain as the card was bended roughly between the boy's massive fingers.

"H.Hey!! That hurts!" Tommy whimpered in agony.

Slamming the card down, Andrew grinned.

"I WIN!!!" Tommy stood up and laughed at the boy he was playing with. He danced around over the game field, nearly stepping on Tommy.

"NO FAIR, YOU MUST HAVE CHEATED!" The other boy cried in disappointment.

"NOPE! A WINS A WIN!!" Andrew grinned.

The other boy looked down at the Green Nova card and grabbed it.

"HEY!" Andrew yelled "THAT'S MINE!"

Andrew was able to grab the other side of the card as it was being pulled away.

Tommy cried out in excruciating pain as the two boys wildly pulled on him from both sides.

"GUYS.. STOP!!!" The teen screamed in desperation "YOU'RE GUNNA!!!----!

*RIIIIIIIIP*

..."oops"
132111.title: On the playground

133.content:
Eric skimmed through all the options

"Hmm.. I don't know.. there's so many to choose..." The teen muttered

"ugh, common, just pick SOMETHING" Tommy whined.

"Alright alright.." Eric quickly looked around the room for something that would interesting to transform his friend into.

It was then that his eyes spotted a bowl of fresh grapes on Tommy's desk.

"hmm....... I guess that would be neat.."

"Alright.. I picked one" Eric spoke

"What did you pick?"

The teen chuckled. "It will be a surprise!"

".... alright then" Tommy's voice was a little nervous.

Without saying another word Eric tightly pulled on the trigger.

*FLASH*

Eric stared down on the carpet where his friend had just been standing.

" Wow... It really worked. " There on the floor was his friend... a grape.

Slowly walking over to his position, Eric carefully leaned over and pinched the sides of the grape[Tommy] between his two fingers.

Effortlessly lifting it up to his face, he examined the small fruit.

"hmm.. looks legit to me..."

The teen then made his way to Tommy's desk to compare him to regular grapes.

Eric grabbed one of the freshly plucked grapes and placed it next to Tommy.

"Wow... almost identical..cool.."

The only real difference between the two was that Tommy had a tiny red speck that distinguished him from the other.

'Well... I guess it can't be completely perfect.." The 15 year old muttered.

Eric shifted himself on the chair and accidentally stepped on a remote control that was on the floor.

The teen quickly turned in surprise as he heard the sound of the television behind him.

He was about to reach for the remote to turn it off when he realized his favorite show was on.

"Alllright! This is the new episode! I almost forgot!"

Eric stared down at his small grape friend for a moment

"Ahh, he doesn't like this show anyways. I'll just change him back after it's over"

Carefully placing Tommy on the desk next to the bowl, Eric returned his attention to the television screen .

About five minutes into the show, the teen's stomach began to growl.

"Ugh, I knew I should have eaten something..." the boy groaned with hunger.

He then placed his attention on the bowl of grapes behind where he had placed Tommy.

"eh, he won't mind if I take a few.." he spoke out loud.

Reaching his hand into the bowl, he grabbed a handful and began chowing down.

Another ten minutes later, Eric's cellphone began to ring in his pocket. Still focused the show, he pulled the phone out, only to lose his grip on it, causing it to fall onto the carpet below. He started to bend over to reach the phone, all while reaching for more grapes with his other hand. The multitasking proved too much for him as he lost his balance on the chair. Without thinking, he quickly reached out for something to steady himself with. He grabbed the grape bowl, causing it to jolt forward, sending Tommy flying off the side of the desk and onto the floor. The rest of the grapes quickly poured out all around him.

"SHIT!!!" Eric cursed.

Deciding to ignore the phone call, Eric got down on his knees and began picking up the grapes.

"Red speck... red speck ... red speck" he chanted to himself as he examined all the grapes he could.

After examining each grape he would place it back into the bowl if he couldn't find the red speck.

He was nearly half way through when he found it.

"There you are!" The grape clearly had a small red speck on it's side.

"Phew... that was a close one, sorry buddy..."

The teen reached down and began scooping up the rest of the grapes, pouring them all back into the bowl.

He didn't worry too much about germs. The area of Tommy's floor that they fell looked relatively clean.

Placing 'Tommy' on the bed next to him, he returned his attention to his show; absentmindedly reaching back into the bowl for more yummy grapes....
133.title: Grape Boy

1331.content:
Tommy's POV
---
"ERICCC!! NO! DON'T PUT ME IN HERE!!! THAT GRAPE ISN'T ME!!!" The teen cried desperately in vain as he was poured into the bowl with the rest.

He had been completely aware of his surroundings the entire time. It came as a horrifying shock when he watched his best friend mistake him for another grape.

He tried with all his might to jump out of the bowl, but deep down he knew it was impossible.

He suddenly saw a ray of hope as he noticed his best friend's hand now reaching back into the bowl. The happy feeling didn't last long however. The teen wasn't even looking as his hand scooped up three grapes.

Tommy could only watch in horror 15 year old popped each grape into his mouth one after another. The terrifying sound of his chewing sent the teen into overdrive.

"ERIC ERIC ERIC! ERIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIICC!!!!!! I'M HERE ! I'M HERE! I'M IN THE BOWL!! ERIC ERIC!!

After tilting his head back and emitting a loud wet gulp, the teen's hand had returned for more.

Tommy's heart stopped as the fingers came down on top of him.

He screamed in utter horror as he was lifted back up to Eric's face along with two other gapes.

He made one final attempt to get his attention

*Pop* The first grape went in followed by the sickening sound of chewing.

ERIC! PLEASE!!!!

*Pop* in went the second grape. The teen hummed with delight as he chewed. The grape he had just bitten into must have been perfectly ripe.

"DON'T EAT MEEEEE .....!!!-" *Pop*

"AAAAAAAAAAAAAGGGGHHhHHHHH!!" The teen screamed as he entered the warm moist cavern. All around him were strands of saliva and remnants of chewed up grapes.

He was totally powerless to do anything as the tongue positioned him directly between the left side of his best friend's molars.

"ERIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII -" *CHOMP*

Eric chewed happily as if it were any other yummy grape. Gulping loudly, the unknowing teen swallowed all remaining remnants of grapes that had been occupying his mouth. .

The credits began to role on Eric's show.

He looked over at the bowl just as he was reaching for more..

"Oops, I should probably leave the rest for Tommy after I bring him back...Don't want to eat TOO many of them"

The boy licked his lips of the delicious grape juices as he picked up the gun, pulling back on the trigger tightly...

The grape on the bed didn't change...
1331.title: Wrong grape

1332.content:
"ERIC! NO! DON'T PUT ME IN HERE!!! THAT GRAPE ISN'T ME!!!" Tommy cried silently as he was poured into the bowl with the rest, the cold, tight flesh of the grapes pressing against his own.

He had been completely aware of his surroundings the entire time. He knew he was in trouble as soon as he saw his best friend begin to chow down on grapes. It would be so easy, just a small mistake, for him to pick him up and consume him.

It came as a horrifying shock to watch Eric pick another grape and set it aside with gentle care, talking to it as though it was him. That meant Eric thought he was...

"ERIC, NO! I'M NOT FOOD, I'M YOUR FRIEND!"

He suddenly saw a ray of hope as he noticed his best friend's hand now reaching back into the bowl. The happy feeling didn't last long however. The teen wasn't even looking as his hand scooped up three grapes. Tommy could only watch in horror as each grape was popped into his friend's mouth one after another. The terrifying sound of his chewing sent the teen into overdrive.

"ERIC ERIC ERIC! ERIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIICC!!!!!! I'M HERE ! I'M HERE! I'M IN THE BOWL!! ERIC ERIC!!" He tried with all his might to jump out of the bowl, but deep down he knew it was futile. There was nothing he could do.

After tilting his head back and emitting a loud wet gulp, the teen's hand had returned for more. Tommy's heart stopped as the fingers came down on top of him.

He screamed in utter horror as he was lifted back up to Eric's face. Eric paused, examining the grape. Tommy's heart leaped. Surely Eric had seen the red spot, the only indication that inside this tiny fruit he was really a human boy!

This one looks particularly juicy, Eric thinks happily, squeezing the grape a little between his thumb and forefinger. Unfortunately for Tommy, the red mark was on the opposite side to the one his friend was looking at. Tommy groaned mentally as Eric's fingers seemed to crush him like a vice. His thin skin strained, almost burst.

"ERIC, DON'T DO THIS!" he screamed as he was popped between the teen's lips.

Eric held the grape between his lips for a moment, mesmerised by a scene on his favourite tv show. Tommy could feel the hot, moist lips smothering his body, and sudden felt his mortal panic give way to a new sensation. Eric's long darted out between his teeth, sliding against his taut skin, sampling his flavour, and Tommy shuddered mentally with pleasure.

It seemed that the transformation had altered his awareness, as though every part of his human body was stretched across every part of the grape, so that it felt as though Eric was tonguing ever inch of his bod at once. Tommy's mind reeled, unable to believe that he was getting off on this even as he was about to die.

*Pop* In went the grape. The teen hummed with delight as he rolled it around the dark, wet cavern of his his mouth with his tongue, sucking it between his teeth from cheek to cheek. It felt perfectly ripe and deliciously sweet. He could barely keep himself from biting right into it.

"NGGGHH! AHH! ERIC! N-NO! THAT FEELS- AHHHH! YES!" Tommy moaned in ecstacy, as the thick muscles of Eric's tongue overwhelmed him, manipulated him. His juices roiled around inside his body, straining against his skin so much he thought he might burst. His mind was flooded with the incredible sensations, and for a moment he forgot all about his existence as a human. "AH! YES! ERIC! EAT ME! PLEASE! EAT ME! POP ME! MASH ME TO A PULP! I'M GOING TO BUUUURST!"

The teen gripped the grape between his huge white molars, their unyielding edges digging into the tiny fruit now coated in his saliva and the remnants of the chewed up grapes that had come before. Powerless, unable to do anything as his best friend prepared to crush and consume his entire existence, Tommy felt his excitement reach its peak, just as Eric's teeth sliced through his soft flesh.

"AAAAAAAAH!"

Eric found himself suddenly pressed into the cushions of the couch as the grape in his mouth expanded almost instantaneously into a fully-sized human boy.
------
Two hours later, Eric had finally finished washing his mouth out. The two friends sat together awkwardly, unsure of who should talk first.

"I'm sorry for eating you," Erik said finally.

"....."

"Let's not talk about it," Erik muttered.

"Right." It was then that Tommy noticed the device again. He picked it up.

"Uh, you sure you want to be touching that after what happened?"

"Sure," Tommy said, a wicked smile crossed his lips. "My turn now, right?
1332.title: Reader's Choice

13322.content:
Eric gulped. "M-maybe we should think about this."

Tommy shook his head. "That was too much fun to think about not doing this," he grinned, pointing the gun at Eric.

With a yelp, Eric squeezed his eyes shut tight. There was a bright flash from behind his eyelids. He didn't feel any different. Cautiously he cracked open his eye.

The device lay on the bedsheets; nestled beside it was Tommy, transformed and small enough to fit entirely in Erik's hand. Erik looked at his best friend around which his fingers were now wrapped, a smile growing on his face, "Mmm, looks like you get a taste for it, huh?" he laughed. "That's interesting, because I think I've got a taste for you," he purred, tossing Tommy into the air and catching him again.

Tommy had made himself into a...
13322.title: Reader's choice

133221.content:
Tommy turned himself into a banana. You hate bananas.

Erik was surprised, then he exclaimed "I LOVE BANANAS!!"

Oh crap, you thought.

If bananas could scream...
133221.title: Banana

1332211.content:
The giant lifted you up and licked his lips. With the face he was making, you just wanted to go home and hide under your blanket. However, you couldn't move without help, and even if you could make it home, you would just be eaten by your family. As your friend stroked you, you remembered how much he loved bananas. He almost always had one during lunch, and ate three per day during the summer.

"Did I mention how tasty you were earlier? You were pretty good, but now that you're a banana, you'll taste super good." Eric said. Even with your peel still on, he gave you a slow lick. You thought you shuddered, but to be honest, when you look like a banana, you can't really tell what you do and don't do. Your executioner took you straight to the kitchen. He gave you another lick with his slimy and disgusting tongue. "You smell good, good enough to eat you. How about we get you out of these clothes, huh?" Eric reached for you. He slowly peeled you, revealing your tasty nutritious insides. As he did this, he licked his lips and gave you a wink. You had never seen him act like this. It was as if you gave off an aura that made him want you desperately. Whatever was happening was changing you also, you looked at Eric's mouth and had a desire to be eaten.

"Eric . . Snap out of it, I'm human remember?" You thought. You knew he couldn't hear you, and it's not like you had a mouth to talk or anything, but you had to hope. Once he gotten the peel off, he threw it away.

"Now, you look better, my scrumptious meal. I should just make you into a banana split." Eric said. He licked his lips at his idea. "However, I have a better idea, one that I think you'll enjoy." You really hoped it was turn you back or turn you into something nicer at least. Today wasn't your day unfortunately because Eric turned around and grabbed a knife. You screamed in your head as the psychopath brought the knife down chopping a little bit off. You were scared and in pain as you were forced to watch Eric chew your piece up. He swallowed and patted his tummy. "You're the most delicious thing I have ever tasted. I must have another piece of you." Eric said and cut another piece.

Just as you thought he was going to cut another piece off, the two of you suddenly heard the door open. Before you knew it, Eric had bolted through the back door as fast as he could. You noticed he took the invention with him, which was probably bad. All you could do was wait to see who it was. You were surprised to see that it was your dad, he was home from work early, and he looked tired.

"Another day of hard work, and no one to greet me home." He said and started looking in the cupboard for something to eat. He turned around with a jar of peanut butter, about to get some bread when he noticed you. He looked around to see if someone was here, but didn't see a single soul. He started to give his mischievous grin. "Well, since this was left here, I guess I have no choice but to eat it myself." Your father opened the jar and grabbed Eric's knife. As he spread some peanut butter right on top of you, you started to scream and told him to stop, even though he clearly couldn't hear you. The peanut butter felt creamy and weird, and you were more scared than ever.

However, that wasn't your biggest concern. What you were worried about was the fact that he was about to devour you, and you didn't seem to mind. This stupid body was changing the way you thought, and it terrified you. Just like how Eric did before, dad brought the knife down, chopping your body. He held the piece with two fingers.

"Mm, I'm sorry your owner suddenly disappeared little banana piece, I hope I can replace them." He said and held it over his mouth. You could feel him chew up your disembodied piece, but soon could no longer feel it connected, physically or mentally. There was only one more piece left of you, and your dad wasn't going to make your trip into his belly fun. He took you over to the blender. Once you were inside, your vision blurred. You could see him getting something but you weren't sure what it was.

"Eric . . Why did you have to leave me? Now my fate is sealed." You thought to yourself. You suddenly felt something pretty heavy on you. You looked up to see some strawberries on you. The door shut, making you not want to see anymore. The blender started and tore you to pieces, making you into simple juice. However, your conscience was still here in the liquid. The giant poured your combined mass into a glass.

"Yum, a banana and strawberry smoothie. Tommy would love this, I wonder where his is." Dad said out loud.

"Oh sure, now wonder where I went to, after I have been sliced and diced." You thought sarcastically. Father started to drink his smoothie. His mouth was warm and you felt lucky that he couldn't chew you up anymore. Once you landed in his stomach, you could immediately, recognize the pieces of banana from you before. They were melted and didn't look good at all. The stomach acids were working on you quickly as well. They hurt a lot, and you were fainting fast. "No" was all you could say as your last words. Both Eric and your dad went on with their lives not knowing exactly what happened to you.
1332211.title: Eaten by two people

choices: Eric pulls his best friend on to his foot
134.content:
Eric giggled to himself when the [sock] option popped up as he was scrolling through.

"Alright, I found one" The teen tried to hold in his laughter

"What is it?" Tommy asked suspiciously after picking up on his friend's expression.

"A sock..." Eric answered quickly

"A SOCK?! Forget it! There's no wa--" Tommy wasn't able to finish as Eric pulled the trigger.

After the flash had subsided, Tommy was no longer there. The teen looked down and saw a discarded sock in his place. Eric couldn't help but laugh hysterically as he walked over to the discarded clothing. Placing the gun down, he reached for the the sock [Tommy] to give him a good look.

"Woooooow this is hilarious" He clearly couldn't talk or move, but the older teen had a feeling Tommy was still aware of his surroundings somehow.

"Wooow, Tommy should really do his laundry more often" Eric spoke playfully. The situation just too comical. He was loving every moment of it.

"Hmmm, I wonder if Tommy would let me borrow this" The teen giggled as he looked down at his own socked feet.

There was a part of him that was considering actually wearing Tommy, but there was also a part that was wondering if that would be going too far.
134.title: Turn him into a sock

1341.content:
Finally giving into temptation, Eric slowly reaches down and begins to peel off his left sock. There was a slight squelching sound as the slightly damp fabric was pulled from his sole. Finally getting the sock completely off, Eric happily wriggled his toes, enjoying the cool air they were receiving.

Bringing his attention back to Tommy [The sock], Eric's heart started to beat loudly, either from anticipation or guilt for what he were about to do. Prying open Tommy's opening with his thumb, the 15 year old slowly started to pull the fabric over his toes. He could only imagine what must have been going through Tommy's mind (If he was still actually aware of what was happening to him).

Slowly pulling the sock on further, the rest of the fabic started to stretch open widely to make room for the teen's barefoot.

After his toes had snugly reached the end, Eric let go of the elastic with a light *snap*. He continued to chuckle at the situation. Here he was, wearing a sock that was actually his best friend. He scrunched his toes with delight and satisfaction, the fabric around them now following their every move.

Standing up, he began to walk around the room. Tommy felt like any other sock, there wasn't really anything all that special about him compared to the sock on his other foot.

After a while of walking, Eric started to get bored. Admittedly, he didn't get that much sleep the night before so he was still kinda tired.

He began to weigh whether or not he should revert Tommy back before he took a quick nap. He stared down on his foot and smiled evilly.

"Eh, he'll probably hate me later, but I kinda want this to last a little longer"

Crawling into Tommy's bed, Eric let out a loud yawn and stretched his toes as he quickly drifted into sleep.

----
[an hour later]
At some point during his sleep Eric must have begun pulling his socks off with his toes, a habit that often occurred while he was sleeping.

Eventually both socks came off and fell onto the carpet below.
----
[An hour later]
