"Of course!" Deep down, Tommy had no idea what the consequences might be. He just secretly always wanted to be in the presence of a tiny person.

"Where would I shrink myself? The older teen looked at the carpet under his feet.

"What if I fall through the carpet fibers or something??"

"Hmmm... good point" Tommy spoke out-loud. That was when his eyes spotted a sheet of paper on his desk

"HERE!" He said as he dropped the sheet onto the carpet below. "Stand on this!".

"Uh.....okay?" The 15 year old awkwardly stepped on the small sheet, causing it to easily crumple under his weight. His feet were clearly too large to be standing on it.

"Alright..looks good." Tommy said as he reached for the laser.

"ARE YOU SURE this is going to be okay?" Eric made one final plea.

Tommy sighed nonchalantly "Just trust me dude. You'll be fine, I'll make sure nothing happens to you" He spoke with a playful smirk.

With that, Tommy aimed the device up at his best-friend and pulled the trigger.

Eric looked on nervously as the world around him distanced its-self further and further away. The small sheet of of paper under him started to crinkle as his feet took up less and less space. By the time he was a half-foot tall, the sheet was like a large carpet to him. The smaller he became the vaster the sheet appeared; The white surface was slowly becoming a foot-ball field sized landscape. The crinkles in the paper that his feet had previously caused now looked like mountainous cliffs.

"H-how small is he going to make me??" Eric began feeling nervous as his insignificant size only dwindled smaller and smaller.

The teen had trouble determining how tiny he was by the time the shrinking had ended. He could only estimate that he was roughly the size of a crumb. The 15 year old had not fully prepared himself for when Tommy roughly grabbed the sheet and began lifting it. The g-force combined with air pressure instantly knocked Eric down to his knees. It was like experiencing the pressure of being on a spaceship during lift-off. The world around the paper seemed to blur like the outside of a vertical merry-go-round

That was when it hit him. The thick unmistakable scent of maple syrup accompanied by a massive hurricane wind-like gust. The force was so powerful that it sent him tumbling backwards two or three times. Readjusting himself, the micro size teen looked up in absolute astonishment. The sky had been replaced by Tommy's unspeakably gargantuan face. Every small detail of his skin was clearly visible as his once smaller friend breathed down on him winds that could have easily rivaled great storms.

"WOOOOAAHHHHHH!!! I CAN BARELY EEEEVEEEENN SEEEEE YOOOOOOOU" Eric covered his ears in pain. The immensity of the voice caused his ears to ring. Normally Tommy's voice had always had a higher pitch than Eric's, but from his new perspective it was like listening to a foghorn. The tiny teen waved his arms frantically, trying to signal the massive teen not to speak again, only praying that he would pick up on his tiny movements. To Eric's relief, it seems Tommy had noticed his friend's discomfort as stopped himself from making another word.

Even though the shock of everything was somewhat terrifying, Eric started to wonder if this might actually end up being fun. I mean, how many people can say they've experienced this before?

Eric tried to imagine what thrilling adventures the two could possibly have at this size.
14.title: Tommy has a shrink ray in his room

141.content:
Tommy carefully walked across the room, making his best effort not to go too fast. He knew that if he was careless, Eric could easily be blown off the sheet.

Looking around the room for a place to examine his newly shrunken friend a bit closer, Tommy was suddenly interrupted when the house phone began to ring.

"Oh no... that's probably my dad" he whispered

"Hold on a sec, I'll be right back!" Not wanting to miss the call, Tommy quickly ran over to his desk and carefully lowered the sheet of paper over his fish-bowl. The younger teen wasted no more time as he darted out his room.

Eric wasn't completely sure what Tommy had placed the sheet on top of. Everything was simply too massive for him to make out the blurry details of the galaxy sized room around him.

One thing did strike him as odd though. There was a faint scent of stagnant water in the air.

Unbeknownst to the tiny teen, Zippy the gold fish was happily swimming in the waters directly under him. Due to the paper having been stepped on earlier, it's center had drooped down far enough so that it was only about a centimeter away from the water's surface.

The sudden white surface above it's bowl must have initially frightened the fish, evidenced by how it was swimming relatively low inside the small container. After the fish seemed to realize that there didn't seem to be any danger, it slowly swam higher and higher to investigate the odd white object.

Eric decided to lay down for a moment, just to take in how incredible this situation was.

"Maybe Tommy was right...this is actually really n-.."

The teen was suddenly interrupted as he felt a strange jolt shake the paper slightly.

"W-..what was THAT?!"

Two seconds later another jolt.

"What's g-going on?!" The crumb sized teen couldn't keep himself standing.

Zippy had begun surfacing himself, lightly knocking the strange white surface. Tommy had forgotten to feed him, so perhaps the small fish was mistaking the paper above him as having something to do with feeding time.

Each time the fish rose to nudge the bottom of the paper, the entire sheet shifted more and more across the top of the bowl.

Eric was too busy trying to keep his balance to notice.

After receiving one final nudge, the right side of the paper fell off the rim of the bowl, causing it to ramp down onto the water's surface.

Eric screamed in fear as he found himself sliding down the massive sheet. There was nothing he could do as he fell off the edge, dropping down into the waters below

Zippy immediately retreated to the bottom of the bowl after the paper had significantly shifted. Keeping an eye on the scene above him, Zippy suddenly noticed a fish-flake floating on the surface of the water. More hungry than it was scared, The small goldfish eagerly began to swim back towards the surface to eat-up the newly introduced treat.

Eric tried his best to stay afloat, but he had never been a very good swimmer. As he found himself sinking, he opened his eyes to see something quickly approaching him from below. It didn't take long for him to identify it as being Tommy's goldfish. The teen remembered all the times that he would look into the fish bowl when he was normal sized. When Tommy first got Zippy, the two friends would simply watch the small fish swim around aimlessly for minutes at a time. There was something so passive and harmless about the creature that had always soothed him. Tommy even let Eric feed the tiny goldfish on a few occasions.

Eric wasn't paying the goldfish any mind until the it started getting closer. From a distance, it still looked like a relatively small fish, but as the range between them lessened, Eric quickly realized how genuinely small he had become. The fish was roughly the size of a stadium and approaching fast. The realization hit him pretty hard. Eric knew that he shrunken quite small, but it had only just occurred to the teen that he was now the perfect size to be a snack for the hungry goldfish. He didn't want to believe it. Little Zippy's appetite was now a threat to his life.

Panicking, Tommy tried to resurface himself, turning around every two seconds to see the fish getting bigger and bigger and bigger.

Eric was so close, just a little more and he'd be able to reach the paper ramp above him.

He turned around one last time to see Zippy's massive lips opening widely behind him. The goldfish was clearly very intent on consuming the tiny speck.

At that very moment Tommy walked back into his bedroom. Eric cried out, reaching towards his friend from behind the glass, causing bubbles to rocket out of his mouth as the lips of the small goldfish passed over him.

("TOMMYYY- !!!")

*NOOOM* The fish quickly sealed it's lips shut, claiming it's prize. Zippy had no indication that what he just ate used to be a full sized-human. To him, it was just another flake to be devoured.

The fish immediately began it's short swim back down to it's usual spot.
------

"Meh, it wasn't even my dad, just some scam-........."

Tommy froze the moment his eyes fell on the fishbowl. The paper his friend had been on top of had fallen into the fish tank; Eric was nowhere to be seen. There was no sign of him in the bowl either, only a harmless looking goldfish swimming back and forth through the water, aimlessly.
141.title: Fishbowl

choices: Tommy wants to play with you some more
142.content:
Unable to discern whether or not his tiny friend was trying to communicate with him, Tommy lifted the crinkled white paper, leveling it with his eyes. Focusing in on the tiny speck, the young teen was finally able to barely make out some of your facial features.

After falling down onto the white surface, it became very clear that just a single action on Tommy's part was now a world altering event for you. Like a deer in headlights, you watched as your friend's two massive eyes focused in on you. The two orbs seemed otherworldly from your tiny perspective. Even something as simple as Tommy's pupils dilating was strikingly noticeable.

Beneath the surface of the paper, Tommy's mouth was now forming a huge grin. He couldn't believe the device worked so perfectly. Admittedly, he had been a little nervous, but now here he was, with his best friend a tiny speck in front of his very eyes. Thoughts raced through the younger teens mind as he began to think of what to do next.

You were waving your arms up and down, trying to communicate, but none of your words seemed to be reaching the young giant. Though you agreed that experiencing all of this was the chance of a life time, you were beginning to get a little nervous about being so vulnerable. Now that Tommy's taken it all in, you've decided that now was the time to change back.

"TOMMY! LETS CHANGE ME BACK AND TRY SOMETHING ELSE."

None of your words were loud enough to register to Tommy's ears; not that he was even trying to listen at this point.

"Hold on a sec" Tommy muttered as he tilted the paper by a few degrees.

"w-WOOAH!! hEY!" you cried as you fell over and began to slide down the white ramp. Down below you could see that Tommy had placed his open palm under the edge of the paper, in order to catch you.

"TOMMY! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?! DUDE!!!" There was no fighting the gravity as you plummeted off the edge. The drop ended quickly as you landed on Tommy's soft warm fleshy palm. All around you, pinkish ridged hills extended off in every direction. It could best be described as utterly surreal. You were standing on the palm of your best friend's hand. Staring down at your own hand, you recounted all the times you had given him a high-five. You shuttered at the thought of the teen giving someone a high five while you were still in his palm. Just Tommy balling his hand into a fist could easily crush you.

Up above Tommy watched closely as you investigated your surroundings. It was surprising to him that your weight didn't even register. He could only imagine how it must look and feel from your perspective. You might as well be standing in the hand of a......god. Tommy stared blankly ahead as his mind started to revolve around that word 'god'. Just the thought was kinda amusing to him.

"TOMMY! WHAT THE HELL DUDE?! I COULD HAVE GOT HURT!" You were starting to feel a sense of hopelessness creep up your spine each time your shouts were ignored. Tommy had always been like this though, it really isn't new for him to block out others when he gets excited about something. Still, you really wish you had anticipated this occurring. You would have never agreed if you realized that you would be unable to communicate with him and have at least a moderate level of control.

Tommy lowered his hand a bit and began to talk.

"Dude.....this is soooooo awesome...." The teen's eyes seemed to glimmer with a child-like fascination.

Not expecting the impact of his voice as the air left his mouth, you found yourself caught off balance as you fell back onto your butt.

Tommy seemed to notice this and let out a soft almost nervous laugh. He friend watched as you stood up; his mind debating whether or not to try something mischievous.

Just as you had brought yourself back to standing position, you felt an even stronger gust of air push you back down. You looked up to see that Tommy was purposefully blowing on you.

"HEY MAN! Not cool!" You yelled as you struggled to stand, only to be blown back over again and again. Each time he did this, Tommy only became more and more amused. He didn't understand that it was genuinely bothering you, so he didn't seem to find any reason to stop; after all, he was only having 'fun'.

"Aw, what's wrong? My breathing a little to much for you little guy?" Tommy spoke condescendingly in a playful manner. Watching your angry expression only made him want to tease you more. Though he wouldn't admit it to himself, he was genuinely enjoying the power he had over you.

Tommy's eyes scanned the room for something he could stand next to you in order to get a good idea of your actual size. The teen stopped when his eyes landed on a slice of cold pizza he had left on his desk earlier. The teen couldn't conceal his laughter as he came up with a 'funny' idea.

Walking over to the desk, Tommy brought his hand down over the pizza and began to tilt it sideways.

The familiar yet unsettling feeling of sliding off of a large surface became apparent as you tumbled across your best friend's fleshy palm. Going mid-air for a moment, your sense of smell was suddenly impacted by the scent of cheese and tomato sauce. With a soft -thud- you found yourself sprawled out on a soft sticky surface.

"UUGHHH! WHAT is this?!?" You lifted your hand to find that the yellowish stringy substance had adhered to your fingers, creating a thick puddy-like strand. You sniffed your hand to find that it smelled oddly......edible? It was then that you finally took in your surroundings. All around you was an alien like landscape. You couldn't put your finger on it, but the scent and texture seemed only familiar.

"Enjoying some of my pizza huh?" Tommy laughed from up above.

"T-TOMMY!!...........wait..what?.....!!!." It finally clicked, Tommy had dropped you onto a slice of pizza!.

You looked down at your sauce stained clothes as you licked your hand clean of the 'cheese'. It was surprisingly delicious, even for someone of your size.

"Does it taste good? Here, let me try!" Tommy smirked as he reached down and grabbed the slice, easily lifting it up to his face.

"W-w..HEY!! DUDE! WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU'RE DOING?!" You watched fearfully from the other side of the pizza as Tommy began to lick his lips.

"DON'T EVEN!!!...!!" Tommy didn't even seem to pay you any mind as he opened his mouth, revealing the gooey saliva coated insides of his maw.

With a quick "CHOMP" Tommy snapped his mouth shut and pulled back, creating a few strands of loose cheese along with him.

"MMMmmmmmm~ Good pizza~ Just in time too! It's just about lunch time!" Tommy spoke happily as he chewed.

You weren't sure if Tommy was aware of just how terrifying his little 'joke' really seemed. Here he was, taking bites of a pizza with you still on it. As frightening as it was, you knew that Tommy would never actually 'eat' you though. Just thinking that the scenario was now 'possible' made you feel uneasy. It didn't help you feel any better as Tommy emitted a loud dramatized 'gulp'.

"Mmm~ So yummy... There's no way I just have just one bite.......I might just need to finish the whole thing!~" Tommy spoke out loud and smirked, almost as if pretending you weren't even there.

The pizza under you shook as the younger teen took another bite, which was momentarily followed by another...and another.

You tried your best to keep your composure, telling yourself that Tommy was only messing with you, but the closer his mouth came, the harder it was to keep yourself thinking rationally.

*CHOMP*

"A-alright dude, I get it hahah! Can you just let me down from..."

*CHOMP*

"DUDE, STOP. THIS ISN'T FUNNY. YOU'RE FREAKING ME OUT NOW"

*CHOMP*

"TOMMMY!!!!!"

You had backed yourself up to the last piece of pizza, but you now had no where else to run. Tommy stared down at the last bit between his thumb and index finger.

"That was a great pizza!" The teen laughed as he licked his lips.

You felt your heart finally starting to slow down. You should have figured he knew that you'd freak out towards the very end.

"Y-yeah, just you wait dude. When I'm back to normal we'll see who's laughing the.." You stopped as the final piece began to slowly approach Tommy's moist lips.

"No reason to leave any to waste!" Tommy spoke as he began opening his mouth wide.

"TOMMY NO!!!! STOP STOP!!!!" You couldn't help it anymore. As much as you felt like you trusted him, you couldn't help imagine that he might actually end up betraying you. After all, if he wanted to, he could eat you and no one would ever know. Any evidence would be consumed and be lost forever.

A low "Ahhhhhhh!!!'" noise bellowed from the back of Tommy's throat as you brought the piece of pizza passed his lips. All the thick gooey saliva in Tommy's mouth quivered as the vibrations of his voice projected past them. Small indistinguishable remnants of pizza were scattered across the boy's tongue. The heat of his mouth radiated against your skin as your world fell into shadow. A drop of saliva splashed onto your shoulder from the pallet of your hungry friend's maw.

"PLEASE !!! TOMMY!! NOOOOOOO!!!"

.....

....

...

"PSYCH!"

Tommy shouted and began to laugh hysterical as he pulled you from his mouth. Though the giant teen couldn't see it, you were visibly shaking.

"You're not going to let me get away with....are you.....?" Tommy spoke nervously.

You simply glared up at him and contemplating the moment you got your hands on that shrinking device.
142.title: Pizza

1421.content:
DUDE SERIOUSLY! Eric cries. TURN ME BACK! You squirm around in between Tommy's giant thumb and index finger, trying to rub the remaining saliva off of your body. You kick your legs finally freeing a mushy crumb of pizza crust (which was about the size of the knee it was stuck on).

Tommy places you in the palm of his hand again and you start to shake wondering where he will put you next.

TOMMY! MAKE ME BIG AGIAN! PLEASE!

Tommy just stares at you, that smile of "I'm lost in awe now" never seeming to cease. He then looks around his room. HMMMM. I WOOONDER WHAAAT WEEE COULD DOOO NEEXT! His voice, despite his attempt to speak softly, still rings in your tiny ears.

CHANGE ME BA- You are cut off as Tommy walks over to his closet, falling backward as his hand moves through the air fast enough to generate a strong wind across his palm. TOOOOOMYYYYY!

He stops by his closet and suddenly adrenaline courses through your body as he lowers his hand to the floor. His hand starts to tilt yet again and you go sliding off and...
1421.title: Tommy wants to play with you some more

choices: He finds you! Is he done playing?
He cant find you, are you stuck here?
14212.content:
The force of gravity is becoming too much as the fall takes an awfully long time at your speck-like size but eventually you land on a spongy surface. Taking a minute to gain your surroundings, you realize by the smell that you've landed in his vans slip on. You are slightly larger than a speck of dust in your best friends shoes. You think it can't get worse but then he starts talking to you.

"I think I'm gonna go skateboarding for a while, I hope I can still find you in all the gunk later!

As you look up to the opening of the shoe, you see Tommy give you a last grin before sticking his barefoot in the shoe that holds you. The whole experience is unreal. At this size, the ridges of Tommy's toe prints were like small valleys. His smallest toe comes right at you like at train, knocking the breath out of you and dragging you to the toe end of the shoe. You try in vain to push it away but at your minute size you weren't expecting it to do much. You feel your world trembling as Tommy starts walking.

Within minutes, the conditions in the vans change. The shoe goes from being somewhat breathable to a humid hell hole. The humidity level in the shoe is just too much and Tommy's feet start raining fury out of every pore. Before long, you are stuck to the underside of his little toe, humuiliated by your younger friend. This becomes even more true as he finally starts skating and you realize you had the misfortune of being in his right shoe.

With every push of his foot, you get wedged deeper in your nasty prison. Tommy seems to have no concern for your well-being as he hasn't checked up on you one. Before long, you start fusing with all the other dirt on his feet. A ball of toejam slowly starts absorbing you into its vile mass. You kick and scream but its useless at this size. After roughly 10 minutes of trying to get away you finally accept your fate and stop fighting it. You fuse with a ball of toejam stuck between a 14 year olds sockless feet. You slowly start to lose conciousness....

When you wake up, you see Tommy searching the sole of his foot for you. Will he find you and return you to normal or do you belong on his foot a bit longer?
14212.title: Land in his shoe

choices: Growing to 2 inches and cleaning my feet?
Shrinking to 1/100th of an inch and surviving on my sole?
142121.content:
Tommy carefully examines his sole for you. He brings his foot really close to his face and recoils in disgust. "I almost feel bad for you! Almost!". He searches dilligently yet he is unable to find your miniscule form on his cheesy foot. Looking around, you realise you are right in the arch under his little toe. Surrounding you are globs of filth from inside your former friends shoes. You never noticed how gross Tommy truly was until you were less than a cm tall under his bare toes.

Tommy, still unable to find you, grabs a nearby magnifying glass and starts running it over his sole. He finally finds you under the the arch of his little toe and can't help but laugh. You have been almost completely absorbed by his toejam and only your head is stil visible. "You look pretty comfortable Eric, I would hate to disturb you!" Tommy says, clearly enjoying the power he has over his once larger friend. "C'mon man! This isn't even funny anymore!" You cry out although it went completely unheard by your giant friend.

You hope for a hint of mercy and seem to have gotten your wish when you see Tommys' giant finger coming directly for the toe you are situated under. The whole situation is surreal. You can see every detail of his giant finger. Little specks of dirt that may have been unnoticable are almost your size. You see the dirty fingernail of a 14 year old boy quickly land directly beneath you and scrape you free of your toejam prison.

Tommy rubs his fingers together clearing most of the toejam from your body. He then places you back on a piece of paper and pulls out his shrink ray. "That was really fun but I think now we should do something else. How about_____?
142121.title: He finds you! Is he done playing?

choices: You wake up to Tommy regrowing you, he finds you easily.
You wake up to Tommy looking for you but he can't find you
1421212.content:
"How about shrinking to 1/100th of an inch and spending the day with my toes? I promise after this I'll give you a turn with the gun! In your current position, you can't put up much of a fight anyway." With Tommy putting it like that you reluctantly agree, besides, he's always kept his word and you already had some pretty nasty revenge in mind when you got you hands on that gun. "Alright buddy here we go!" Tommy exclaims as he pulls the trigger of the ray gun.

As your world gets infinitely tinier, you start losing footing in the fibres of the paper. You find youself getting smaller and smaller until you are able to fit comfortably in a pore of the piece of paper. You stop shrinking just before you are small enough to fall through a hole in the weaves of recycled tree matter. At this size, it doesn't even look white anymore. You wonder if it wasn't a cheap 99 cent notepad if he would have already fallen through.

"I'm gonna lower you down now! Get ready!" Is what Tommy said but at your current size you understood none of that. You see his monolithic fingers approaching the the paper and very gently picking it up. He glances over the piece of paper quickly but does not see you. You are of course there but at this size he would need a microscope to see you. Not wanting to make you panic, he doesn't mention it and proceeds to lower the paper to his foot. The whole ordeal is insane, you feel as though your body is gonna burst the whole ride down. The paper finally reaches his foot and lands right under his toes. The impact sends you flying and landing right at the edge of his big toenail. You manage to grip the edge of the nail before flying and pull yourself back up. When you get back up you are in shock.

"What the hell? I have to spend the day in this? I dont even think I can just go back to being friends with him after this. I wont even be able to look him in the eye! This is far too humiliating! Not to mention the smell! He probably hasn't washed his feet since soccer practice!" All these thoughts run through your head as you face an accumulation of sock lint, dirt, sweat and food crumbs accumulated into a mountain easily 10 times your size. You decide to try to take a nap and hope that when you wake up Tommy gets off his power trip. You walk over to the mountain of toejam and make yourself a bed. The toejam was surprisingly comfortable if not anything else. The warm crevice kept you warm as you slowly started dozing off...
1421212.title: Shrinking to 1/100th of an inch and surviving o...

14212122.content:
You wake up to Tommy in fact being true to his word. "Okay Eric, you can come out now! I'm done!" You get up from your toejam bed rather easily. You hate to admit it, but that was probably the best nap you ever took in your life. He is inspecting his sole looking for you, but doesn't see you anywhere. He remembers you guys both have cellphones and gives you a text. "Where the hell r u? I cant see u anywhere!"

You feel your phone vibrate and thank whatever god you believe in that you have that on you. You tell him you are under his big toenail and you will start walking to the print of his toe. You walk out from his toenail and try to climb up the toe to no success. No matter how much you try you just can't get a grip. You decide that maybe if you got naked and lathered yourself in toegunk you just might be able to stick. You keeo your underwear on for self decency. When you get back to normal Tommy better replace all your clothes!

Surprisingly, your little toejam trick actually works and you make it to the ridge of the toe. You barely notice the smell anymore and to be honest you start kinda enjoying yourself. It's like rock climbing but on a person who is normally younger and shorter than you. You start to feel really hungry and notice a crumb of some bread in your toejam costume. Without any reluctance, you grab the crumb and take a bite. It still tastes awful but it is surprisingly filling and instanly revitalizes you.

Just as you are ready to get back on the road Tommy gets a text. Some girl he has a crush on asks him to go to the movies with her. He instantly accepts and texts you as well. "Sorry man, Melina wants to go to the movies and I can't say no. I'll grow you back later!" You immediatly text him back "grow me back now you asshol..." but before you can finish your text your phone flies out of your hands as Tommy lowers his sockless feet down to his putrid vans. As he does this you are pushed against the insole and the print of his big toe. The pressure place upon you slowly forces you into a pore on the sole of his foot. As you get absorbed, you start to find it impossible to breath. You try in vain to scream a few last times before you ultimately die from being suffocated/ drowned by/in footsweat. Little did Melina know she cause a death.

About a month later, Tommy had to go see a doctor for a blister that formed right under his big toe. The doctor took a scalpel and popped the blister to find an abnormal little rock in his pore. He informed Tommy that the blister was from a blocked sweat gland and that he should follow better hygeine routines. Having assumed he crushed you in his shoes, he never knew that was you on his foot...
14212122.title: You wake up to Tommy looking for you but he can...

1422.content:
Deciding he's had enough fun for now, Tommy carefully plucks his speck sized best friend from the remaining pizza, and sets him on the floor in front of him.

"Stay still, I'm going to grow you back. I promise this time, no tricks!" Tommy tells you as you stand in front of his massive form.

Tommy plays with the settings on the gun, before aiming it at you. He pulls the trigger, and a flash of light envelops you. When it fades, you're back to your normal height. "Ugh, man, I'm still covered in sauce, and stuff! This is nasty!" You say to Tommy.

"So, um....no hard feelings, right? It was all just a joke.....you know that, right?" Tommy looks at you almost nervously.

"No hard feelings? After what you did, you're going to get it!" You smile mischievously at your friend. "Give me that gun! It's your turn to be tiny!" You lunge at Tommy, attemtping to pry the gun from his hands.

"Hey! Stop! It's mine! Besides, I didn't say you could use it!" Tommy protests, and struggles to keep the gun in his hands.

You had no intention of giving up so easily though. Grabbing onto half of the gun, you try to pull it from Tommy's grasp. Tommy pulls back, resulting in a game of tug-of-war between the two of you. "Give me the gun!" You shout at him. "No!" He shouts back. As the two of you wrestle for control of the gun, you hardly notice walking out of Tommy's room, and into the hallway. As you argue, and fight, you eventually come to the kitchen.

Backing Tommy against the kitchen table, you think you finally have him cornered. "It's mine! I'm going to get you back so hard for what you did!" You yell, and pull as hard as you can. In your struggle though, you don't notice that you've been flipping switches, and dials, and as Tommy yells, trying to wrest control of the gun, he accidently pulls the trigger.

A blinding flash of light engulfs both you and Tommy, and when it fades, the world around you is gigantic yet again, and you seem to be rolling on top of the kitchen table. "See what you did?" Tommy yells out to you. Now we're both tiny! What are we going to do now?"

"What I did!? This was all YOUR fault! It was your stupid idea anyway to even use the gun! Now we have to get he-" You stop as you see your friend lying next to you. Only he wasn't Tommy anymore. He was a yellow M&M. "Um.....Tommy.....You're.....WE'RE..... M&Ms....."

"What!? We must have messed with the dials or something, and changed the settings! This is even worse than being small! We need someone to use the gun to change us back!"

"Who's going to do that? I mean, we can't talk to anyone now, and all anyone is going to see is two pieces of candy! This is bad! We're going to be stuck as two pieces of chocolate forever!"

As the two of you panic, you hear the door suddenly open, and footsteps approaching the kitchen. "I thought nobody was going to be here? Who just came in?"

"Oh no.....It's....."
1422.title: Tommy grows you back

choices: Matt decides to save his snack, and play with the toy
14221.content:
The sound of footsteps approaching rings through your ears. You look into the hallway, nervously trying to see who's coming. The form of a boy, around 11 years old makes itself clear as he enters the kitchen.

"It's Matt.....I thought he'd be out visiting a friend all day! He shouldn't be here!" Tommy explains to you. "Well, let's just hope he's not hungry....." You reply back to Tommy.
